required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 18, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Effectiveness Study of the Sinovac's Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) Vaccine
clinical_study.official_title: A Stepped-wedge Cluster Randomized Trial to Assess the Effectiveness of the Use of the Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) Vaccine Manufactured by Sinovac

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a stepped-wedge cluster randomized trial to assess effectiveness of Sinovac's Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) vaccine. Residents in the urban area of a municipality are eligible to participate. The city was divided in clusters and those cluster were grouped to determine the offer of vaccination in four steps. The vaccine will be offered to adults (18 years old and above) according to the location of their homes in a cluster. The vaccine schedule is two doses with four-weeks interval. Baseline samples to determine previous immunity will be collected before vaccination.
Cases of COVID-19 reported in the city will be recorded according to the WHO clinical progression scale. Comparison of periods before and after vaccination and relation to immunization coverage will be considered for the assessment of effectiveness in the clusters and groups of clusters.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Groups of cluster are allocated to offer vaccination in a stepped-wedge mode.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of COVID-19 cases after two-doses immunization schedule in clusters in the first quarter of study
primary_outcome.time_frame: Thirteen weeks after the beginning of study vaccination
primary_outcome.description: Number of virologically-confirmed symptomatic COVID-19 six weeks after beginning of study vaccination up to thirteen weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of COVID-19 cases after two-doses immunization schedule in clusters up to one year of study
secondary_outcome.time_frame: One year after the beginning of study vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Number of virologically-confirmed symptomatic COVID-19 six weeks after beginning of study vaccination up to one year

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of COVID-19 cases after two-doses immunization schedule in clusters according to immunization status
secondary_outcome.time_frame: One year after the beginning of study vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Number of virologically-confirmed symptomatic COVID-19 six weeks after beginning of study vaccination up to one year according to immunization status

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of COVID-19 cases after two-doses immunization schedule in clusters according to pre-existing SARS-CoV-2 antibodies
secondary_outcome.time_frame: One year after the beginning of study vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Number of virologically-confirmed symptomatic COVID-19 six weeks after beginning of study vaccination up to one year according to pre-existing SARS-CoV-2 antibodies

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of COVID-19 cases after two-doses immunization schedule in clusters according to immunization coverage
secondary_outcome.time_frame: One year after the beginning of study vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Number of virologically-confirmed symptomatic COVID-19 six weeks after beginning of study vaccination up to one year according to immunization coverage

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of hospitalization and death due to COVID-19 after two-doses immunization schedule in clusters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: One year after the beginning of study vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Number of hospitalization and death due to COVID-19 six weeks after beginning of study vaccination up to one year

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in average number of reported COVID-19 cases in the study area in comparison to other neighboring cities
secondary_outcome.time_frame: One year after the beginning of study vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Average number of reported COVID-19 cases in the microregion where the study area is located

secondary_outcome.measure: Medically-attended adverse reactions to the study vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: Number of medically-attended adverse reactions to the study vaccine

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first vaccination up to one year after first dose
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of virologically-confirmed severe COVID-19 cases after receiving, at least, one dose of the vaccine

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of adverse events of special interest after immunization
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first vaccination up to one year after first dose
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of adverse events of special interest after receiving, at least, one dose of the vaccine

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks after the beginning of study vaccination of the corresponding cluster
secondary_outcome.description: Acceptability rate of the study vaccine in the eligible population of each cluster

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Six weeks after the beginning of study vaccination of the corresponding cluster
secondary_outcome.description: Adherence rate to vaccination schedule in the population of each cluster

other_outcome.measure: Frequency of SARS-CoV-2 variants in the study area
other_outcome.time_frame: One year after the beginning of study vaccination
other_outcome.description: Description of SARS-CoV-2 variants sequenced out of the samples collected in the study area

arm_group.description: Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) vaccine offered in the first week of study The vaccine is administrated in two doses with a four-weeks interval
Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) vaccine offered in the second week of study The vaccine is administrated in two doses with a four-weeks interval
Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) vaccine offered in the third week of study The vaccine is administrated in two doses with a four-weeks interval
Adsorbed COVID-19 (Inactivated) vaccine offered in the fourth week of study The vaccine is administrated in two doses with a four-weeks interval

intervention.description: Adsorbed COVID-19 (inactivated) Vaccine manufactured by Sinovac
